Name: glomerulosclerosis
Definition: A glomerulonephritis that is characterized by hardening of the glomerulus in the kidney.

Name: lupus nephritis
Definition: A glomerulonephritis that is characterized by inflammation of the kidneys resulting from systemic lupus erythematosus.

Name: membranous glomerulonephritis
Definition: An ovarian disease that is characterized by inflammation of the ovary.

Name: obsolete poliovirus type III nonparalytic poliomyelitis
Definition: A nonparalytic poliomyelitis that results_in destruction located_in motor neurons
Synonym: acute nonparalytic poliomyelitis poliovirus type III

Name: obsolete poliovirus type I nonparalytic poliomyelitis
Definition: A nonparalytic poliomyelitis that results_in destruction located_in motor neurons
Synonym: acute nonparalytic poliomyelitis poliovirus type I

Name: chronic rapidly progressive glomerulonephritis
Definition: A female reproductive system disease that is located_in the ovary.
Synonym: chronic glomerulonephritis with lesion of rapidly progressive glomerulonephritis

Name: acute proliferative glomerulonephritis
Definition: A blepharitis that is characterized by an infection of the sebaceous glands of Zeis at the base of the eyelashes
Synonym: acute glomerulonephritis with lesion of proliferative glomerulonephritis

Name: acute poststreptococcal glomerulonephritis
Definition: A female reproductive organ cancer that is located_in the paraurethral glands.

Name: membranoproliferative glomerulonephritis
Definition: A hypersensitivity reaction type IV disease that results from the presence of excessive amounts of a single monoclonal gammaglobulin in the blood.

Name: IgA glomerulonephritis
Definition: A glomerulonephritis characterized by build up of IgA antibody in the glomerulus.

Name: rapidly progressive glomerulonephritis
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in infection in domesticated housecats

Name: exudative glomerulonephritis
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in infection in domesticated housecats

Name: proliferative glomerulonephritis
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in infection in domesticated housecats

Name: focal embolic glomerulonephritis
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in infection in domesticated housecats

Name: obsolete breast vascular neoplasm
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in infection in domesticated housecats

Name: diffuse glomerulonephritis
Definition: A Goodpasture syndrome that is characterized by damage to only kidney capillaries.

Name: subacute glomerulonephritis
Definition: A Goodpasture syndrome that is characterized by damage to only kidney capillaries.

Name: mesangial proliferative glomerulonephritis
Definition: A Goodpasture syndrome that is characterized by damage to only kidney capillaries.

Name: immune-complex glomerulonephritis
Definition: A Goodpasture syndrome that is characterized by damage to only kidney capillaries.

Name: obsolete primitive neuroectodermal tumor with Leptomeningeal Spread
Definition: A Goodpasture syndrome that is characterized by damage to only kidney capillaries.
